meanings.definition: Purchase goods or services in exchange for money.
meanings.sent1: She buys a new book every month.
meanings.sent2: He buys groceries from the store every week.
meanings.sent3: The cat buys a ticket to the mouse circus.
meanings.sent4: The sun buys its way through the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The student buys knowledge with each textbook.

meanings.definition: Acquire possession or ownership of something by paying for it.
meanings.sent1: My friend buys a new car.
meanings.sent2: The family buys a house in the city.
meanings.sent3: The tree buys a squirrel as a tenant.
meanings.sent4: Time buys memories with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The artist buys inspiration with every brushstroke.
